CustomField.formula: IF( ADDMONTHS(RTL_Date_Of_Birth__c, ((YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(RTL_Date_Of_Birth__c)) * 12 )) < TODAY(), ADDMONTHS(RTL_Date_Of_Birth__c, ((YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(RTL_Date_Of_Birth__c)) * 12 ) + 12 ), ADDMONTHS(RTL_Date_Of_Birth__c, ((YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(RTL_Date_Of_Birth__c)) * 12 )))
CustomField.label: Next Birthday
